definition: continuous and profound contemplation or musing on a subject or series of subjects of a deep or abstruse nature
details:
noun
- continuous and profound contemplation or musing on a subject or series of subjects of a deep or abstruse nature
= example: continuous and profound contemplation or musing on a subject or series of subjects of a deep or abstruse nature
= synonyms: speculation
- focused contemplation, often on religious or philosophical subjects
= example: focused contemplation, often on religious or philosophical subjects
